summary: Tested advanced filters feature in Contratos page. All 12 frontend tests passed covering: filter UI rendering, toggle panel, search filter, proveedor/cultivo/campana/tipo dropdown filters, date range filters (desde/hasta), clear filters button, active filters badge count, combining multiple filters, and result count updates.

runtime_errors.issue: Cannot read properties of undefined (reading '_leaflet_pos') - appears intermittently in dashboard/map views but does not affect Contratos functionality

seed_data_creation: No new seed data created - tests work with existing contratos data
context_for_next_testing_agent:
Advanced filters in Contratos page fully tested:

TEST IDS USED:
- contratos-page: main page container
- contratos-filtros: filter section container
- input-buscar-contratos: search text input
- btn-toggle-filtros: toggle advanced filters panel button
- select-filtro-proveedor: proveedor dropdown filter
- select-filtro-cultivo: cultivo dropdown filter
- select-filtro-campana: campana dropdown filter
- select-filtro-tipo: tipo dropdown filter
- input-filtro-fecha-desde: date from input
- input-filtro-fecha-hasta: date to input
- btn-limpiar-filtros: clear all filters button

KEY BEHAVIORS VERIFIED:
1. Filters panel toggles visibility on btn-toggle-filtros click
2. All filter dropdowns populate with unique values from existing contratos
3. Date range filters work correctly
4. Badge shows count of active filters (excludes search from count)
5. Clear button resets all filters and hides when no filters active
6. Result summary text shows 'filtrados' when filters applied

KNOWN ISSUE: ResumenDiario modal and webpack-dev-server iframe can block clicks - tests handle this by dismissing modal and removing overlay in beforeEach
